bug.author: myungjoo
bug.summary: [REGRESSION!] TypeCast Unit TC Fail in aarch64/armv7l
bug.description:
With the current master, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/commit/4ace9e923b873e90b1a097dff3a480f17c0d1d80>4ace9e9</denchmark-link>
aarch64 / armv7l: <denchmark-code>[ 392s] ================================================== [ 392s] Test Group transform_typecast Starts. [ 392s] [PASSED] 0:gst-launch of case 0 [ 392s] [PASSED] 1:gst-launch of case 1 [ 392s] [PASSED] 1:Golden test comparison [ 392s] [PASSED] 2:gst-launch of case 2 [ 392s] [PASSED] 2:Golden test comparison [ 392s] [PASSED] 3:gst-launch of case 3 [ 392s] [PASSED] 3:Golden test comparison [ 392s] [PASSED] 4:gst-launch of case 4 [ 392s] [PASSED] 4:Golden test comparison [ 392s] [PASSED] 5:gst-launch of case 5 [ 392s] [PASSED] 5:Golden test comparison [ 392s] [PASSED] 6:gst-launch of case 6 [ 392s] [PASSED] 6:Golden test comparison [ 392s] [PASSED] 7:gst-launch of case 7 [ 392s] [PASSED] 7:Golden test comparison [ 392s] [PASSED] 8:gst-launch of case 8 [ 392s] [FAILED][Critical] 8:Golden test comparison [ 392s] [PASSED] 9:gst-launch of case 9 [ 392s] [FAILED][Critical] 9:Golden test comparison [ 392s] ================================================== [ 392s] [FAILED] Test Group transform_typecast has failed cases (2) [ 392s] ================================================== </denchmark-code>
We definitely need nightly/daily unit test for armv7l & aarch64

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/882>#882</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.

Uh.. this is typecasting float-to-uint problem. Didn't we resolve this already??? PTAL <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wooksong>@wooksong</denchmark-link> (If my memory serves right, it was you who brought this up and solved it)

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/myungjoo>@myungjoo</denchmark-link> Right. The typecasting float-to-uint issue was resolved and unit TCs <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/8>#8</denchmark-link> /<denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/9>#9</denchmark-link> were not failed until tensor_transform is refactored. Anyway, I will look into it. While I am writing the comment, you've already submitted the PR to resolve this issue. Thanks.
